LanguageData.MorrowRim_ObtainedAlbinoSpiderPod: The albino spider corpse wasn't completely destroyed, which has left an undamaged albino spider pod.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_SpiderSpawner_Tooltip: Batches remaining: {0}\nTime until next batch spawns: {1}
